CustomField.formula: IF( YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) = 2018 , One_Off_2019__c, One_Off_2018__c) + IF( Realized_starting_this_year__c =False, IF( (Savings_period__c+ Savings_period__c ) > 12, ( Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c ) * ( 12 - Realization_start_month__c + 1 ) , Total_Recurrent__c ) , IF( Savings_period__c + Realization_start_month__c > 24, ( Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c ) * 12 , IF( (Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c - 1) < 12 , 0, IF(( Savings_period__c + Realization_start_month__c - 1) < 24, ( Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c ) * ( Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c - 12), (Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c) * 12 ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Savings next year
